name: Bincombe Bumps Roundabout No.21

Description.value: Advertising on Dorset's roundabouts offers you one of the most cost-effective ways to raise your company's profile and promote your business, whilst making a positive contribution to the County's landscape.  Located on the A353 close to Weymouth Relief Road and Littlemoor, the Bincombe Bumps roundabout offers excellent opportunities for sponsorship and advertising signage.

metadataTitle: Roundabout sponsorship - Bincombe Bumps | Dorset Council
metadataDescription: Located on the A353 close to Weymouth Relief Road and Littlemoor, the Bincombe Bumps roundabout offers excellent opportunities for sponsorship and advertising signage.
